00031 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_NOTINSET_H
00032 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_NOTINSET_H
00033 
00034 // Checks if a variable is not in a fixed set.
00035 template<typename Var>
00036   struct WatchNotInSetConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00037 {
00038   virtual string constraint_name()
00039     { return "WatchedNotInSet"; }
00040 
00041   Var var;
00042 
00043   vector<DomainInt> vals;
00044 
00045   template<typename T>
00046   WatchNotInSetConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var& _var, const T& _vals) :
00047   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var), vals(_vals.begin(), _vals.end())
00048     { stable_sort(vals.begin(), vals.end()); }
00049 
00050   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00051     { return 2; }
00052 
00053   virtual void full_propagate()
00054   {  
00055     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00056 
00057     if(var.isBound())
00058     {
00059       var.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainChanged);
00060       propagate(NULL);
00061     }
00062     else
00063     {
00064       for(DomainInt i = 0; i < vals.size(); ++i)
00065         var.removeFromDomain(vals[i]);
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00070   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00071   {
00072     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchInSet);
00073     // If we are in here, we have a bounds variable.
00074     D_ASSERT(var.isBound());
00075     //lower loop
00076     int lower_index = 0;
00077     
00078     while(lower_index < (int)vals.size() && vals[lower_index] <= var.getMin())
00079     {
00080       var.setMin(vals[lower_index] + 1);
00081       lower_index++;
00082     }
00083     
00084     int upper_index = vals.size() - 1;
00085     
00086     while(upper_index > 0 && vals[upper_index] >= var.getMax())
00087     {
00088       var.setMax(vals[upper_index] - 1);
00089       upper_index--;
00090     }
00091   }
00092 
00093   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00094   {
00095     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00096     return !binary_search(vals.begin(), vals.end(), v[0]);
00097   }
00098 
00099   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00100   { 
00101     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00102     vars.reserve(1);
00103     vars.push_back(var);
00104     return vars;
00105   }
00106 
00107   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00108   {  
00110     for(DomainInt i = var.getMin(); i <= var.getMax(); ++i)
00111     { 
00112       if(var.inDomain(i) && !binary_search(vals.begin(), vals.end(), i))
00113       {
00114         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, i));
00115         return true;
00116       }
00117     }
00118     return false;
00119   }
00120 };
00121 
00122 template<typename VarArray1>
00123 AbstractConstraint*
00124 BuildCT_WATCHED_NOT_INSET(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00125 { 
00126   return new WatchNotInSetConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type>
00127     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], b.constants[0]); 
00128 }
00129 
00130 #endif
